law.catch_line: To implement the policy set out in § 14-102 of this title, the Secretary, with the advice of the Se...
law.text: To implement the policy set out in § 14-102 of this title, the Secretary, with the advice of the Secretary of Health and Mental Hygiene and the Secretary of Aging, shall develop, supervise, and cause each local department to implement a program of protective services for disabled individuals and vulnerable adults.
